title: Queer & Now (with Aida Rodriguez)
itunes:title: Queer & Now (with Aida Rodriguez)
description:
Was Luther Vandross secretly gay? Langston and his guest Aida Rodriguez (Fighting Words on HBO Max) clean out the closet on this old school conspiracy.
